name: omanbiz-pro-complete
description: Complete Business Management System for Omani Businesses

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: OmanBiz Pro Team
